item.description:
Hey everybody!!

So we are taking at least this week off of improv and doing something fun and social. The Institute of Contemporary Art down in the Waterfront area is open everything Thursday night from 5-9 for free! So we'll be checking out this Thursday. I moved up the time to meetup at 7pm. If those interested feel that's too early we can push it back to 7:30. I just want to make sure we get a good start and some time to appreciate the art.

Let me know what you all think. As of right now we'll meet in the lobby at 7:00.

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll just be there and be looking artsy.
item.name: Kickin it Social Style Part 1: FREE Thursdays Institute of Comtemporary Art!!!!
